content: 12 point afghan pattern is no longer available at the angelcrafts website but is available at project angel kisses via the wayback archive can also use sportweight yarn with an f / 3 75 mm hook no gauge provided tutorial available in french with designer s permission 1 1 http //notre atelier over-blog com/article-tutoriel-couverture-etoile-12-branches-109406040 html
